Field Detail

PRECISION

public static double PRECISION
The precistion that is used for comparisons of doubles. That is two doubles a and b are considered to be equal, if Math.abs(a - b) < PRECISION.

SAFETY_MARGIN_FACTOR

public static double SAFETY_MARGIN_FACTOR
The factor that is used to compute SAFETY_MARGIN.

SAFETY_MARGIN

public static double SAFETY_MARGIN
A safety margin that is used in some operations when unfolding a curve up and including to a value x. To ensure that the a curve segment that starts at x is really included, some operations unfold the curve up to a value x + SAFETY_MARGIN.

SAFETY_MARGIN is computed as the product of SAFETY_MARGIN_FACTOR and PRECISION.

PATH_SEPARATOR

public static java.lang.String PATH_SEPARATOR
The file path separator of the operating system.

setPrecision

public static void setPrecision(double precision)
Set PRECISION. Note that SAFETY_MARGIN is also updated.

Parameters:

setSafetyMarginFactor

public static void setSafetyMarginFactor(double factor)
Set SAFETY_MARGIN_FACTOR. Note that SAFETY_MARGIN is also updated.

Parameters:
factor - the new value for SAFETY_MARGIN_FACTOR.
